message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. To start, I propose a price of $950000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to come closer to it. My counteroffer is $875000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit away from the price I'm comfortable with. I'd like to meet you at $825000, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $825000 is a bit high for me. Can we discuss $800000?
